message: Let's be fair, I'll get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, meet me in the middle
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it - we're both losing money here!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Okay, Alice, let's stop this. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.  Don't let greed make us both losers.
